page.title: 05Where people work.
page.content: Survey of the 15 homes in Kirk Bramwith. 2 _ Retired families. 1 _ Market stall holder (Doncaster & Pontefract.) 1 _ Haulage Contractor. 1 _ Policeman (Stainforth.) 1 _ Engineer. 1 _ Builder (Braithwaite.) 1 _ Art teacher. 1 _ Painter and sign writer. 1 _ Butcher (Stainforth.) 1 _ Accountant. 1 _ Quantity surveyor. 1 _ Sales representative. 1 _ Bridge keeper. 1 _ Dun Drainage employee. In addition 2 wives are teachers one other is a micro_wave demonstrator and one more is a nurse, the remaining ladies are house wives.
